channel.title: [Tables] Calculating Area, Perimeter etc of rectangle [QBASIC]
channel.description:
[code]REM Boxes REM William REM 11/24/09 ' COLOR 16,15 CLS REM INPUT LET sport1$ = "football" LET length1 = 360 LET width1 = 160 LET sport2$ = "basketball court" LET length2 = 94 LET width2 = 50 ' REM PROCESSING LET perim1 = 2 * length1 + 2 * width1 LET area1 = length1 * width1 LET perim2 = 2 * length2 + 2 * width2 LET area2 = length2 * width2 ' REM OUTPUT PRINT "The length (feet) of a " ; sport1$ ;" is:" ; length1 ;"." PRINT "The width (feet) of a " ; sport1$ ;" is:" ; width1 ;"." PRINT "The perimeter (feet) of a " ; sport1$ ;" is:" ; perim1 ;"." PRINT "The area (square feet) of a " ; sport1$ ;" is:" ; area1 ;"." PRINT " " PRINT "The length (feet) of a " ; sport2$ ;" is:" ; length2 ;"." PRINT "The width (feet) of a " ; sport2$ ;" is:" ; width2 ;"." PRINT "The perimeter (feet) of a " ; sport2$ ;" is:" ; perim2 ;"." PRINT "The area (square feet) of a " ; sport2$ ;" is:" ; area2 ;"." ' END[/code]
Tables [code] REM Sports Field/Court Size Comparisons REM William REM 11/24/09 ' COLOR 16, 15 CLS REM INPUT LET sport1$ = "football" LET length1 = 360 LET width1 = 160 LET sport2$ = "basketball" LET length2 = 94 LET width2 = 50 LET sport3$ = "soccer" LET length3 = 300 LET width3 = 180 LET sport4$ = "lacrosse" LET length4 = 330 LET width4 = 180 LET sport5$ = "hockey" LET length5 = 300 LET width5 = 180 ' REM PROCESSING LET perim1 = 2 * length1 + 2 * width1 LET area1 = length1 * width1 LET perim2 = 2 * length2 + 2 * width2 LET area2 = length2 * width2 LET perim3 = 2 * length3 + 2 * width3 LET area3 = length3 * width3 LET perim4 = 2 * length4 + 2 * width4 LET area4 = length4 * width4 LET perim5 = 2 * length5 + 2 * width5 LET area5 = length5 * width5 ' REM OUTPUT COLOR 17,15 CLS REM Sports Field/Court Size Comparisons CLS PRINT ,"Sports Field/Court Size Comparisons" PRINT PRINT "Sport","Length","Width","Perimeter","Area" PRINT sport1$,length1,width1,perim1,area1 PRINT sport2$,length2,width2,perim2,area2 PRINT sport3$,length3,width3,perim3,area3 PRINT sport4$,length4,width4,perim4,area4 PRINT sport5$,length5,width5,perim5,area5 ' END[/code]

item.title: [Tables] Calculating Area, Perimeter etc of rectangle [QBASIC]
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“abraham2119, post:8, topic:316102”][quote author=Punniabi16 link=topic=412678.msg3043317#msg3043317 date=1259278841]

With all the brilliant languages (including C, Java, Python, and Delphi), why do you use out-dated, futile BASIC?

lol you think Python and Delphi are better then Basic… rofl.
[/quote]fail troll idiot[/quote]Either that, or just a straight up idiot.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

REM Boxes REM William REM 11/24/09 ' COLOR 16,15 CLS REM INPUT LET sport1$ = "football" LET length1 = 360 LET width1 = 160 LET sport2$ = "basketball court" LET length2 = 94 LET width2 = 50 ' REM PROCESSING LET perim1 = 2 * length1 + 2 * width1 LET area1 = length1 * width1 LET perim2 = 2 * length2 + 2 * width2 LET area2 = length2 * width2 ' REM OUTPUT PRINT "The length (feet) of a " ; sport1$ ;" is:" ; length1 ;"." PRINT "The width (feet) of a " ; sport1$ ;" is:" ; width1 ;"." PRINT "The perimeter (feet) of a " ; sport1$ ;" is:" ; perim1 ;"." PRINT "The area (square feet) of a " ; sport1$ ;" is:" ; area1 ;"." PRINT " " PRINT "The length (feet) of a " ; sport2$ ;" is:" ; length2 ;"." PRINT "The width (feet) of a " ; sport2$ ;" is:" ; width2 ;"." PRINT "The perimeter (feet) of a " ; sport2$ ;" is:" ; perim2 ;"." PRINT "The area (square feet) of a " ; sport2$ ;" is:" ; area2 ;"." ' END

Tables

REM Sports Field/Court Size Comparisons REM William REM 11/24/09 ' COLOR 16, 15 CLS REM INPUT LET sport1$ = "football" LET length1 = 360 LET width1 = 160 LET sport2$ = "basketball" LET length2 = 94 LET width2 = 50 LET sport3$ = "soccer" LET length3 = 300 LET width3 = 180 LET sport4$ = "lacrosse" LET length4 = 330 LET width4 = 180 LET sport5$ = "hockey" LET length5 = 300 LET width5 = 180 ' REM PROCESSING LET perim1 = 2 * length1 + 2 * width1 LET area1 = length1 * width1 LET perim2 = 2 * length2 + 2 * width2 LET area2 = length2 * width2 LET perim3 = 2 * length3 + 2 * width3 LET area3 = length3 * width3 LET perim4 = 2 * length4 + 2 * width4 LET area4 = length4 * width4 LET perim5 = 2 * length5 + 2 * width5 LET area5 = length5 * width5 ' REM OUTPUT COLOR 17,15 CLS REM Sports Field/Court Size Comparisons CLS PRINT ,"Sports Field/Court Size Comparisons" PRINT PRINT "Sport","Length","Width","Perimeter","Area" PRINT sport1$,length1,width1,perim1,area1 PRINT sport2$,length2,width2,perim2,area2 PRINT sport3$,length3,width3,perim3,area3 PRINT sport4$,length4,width4,perim4,area4 PRINT sport5$,length5,width5,perim5,area5 ' END
